ThingDef.label: animal immunoenhancer
ThingDef.description: An analysis computer which inspects the bloodstream, classifies pathogens, and rapidly prompts the body's natural immune system to respond to them faster than it could alone. This speeds immunity gain significantly.

ThingDef.label: animal circadian supercharger
ThingDef.description: A combination assistant and half-cycler, disables the need to rest of the animal without affecting its consciousness. An animal using this implant will be susceptible to EMP weapons.

ThingDef.label: animal healclot synergizer
ThingDef.description: A combination coagulator and healing enhancer, combines advanced coagulation and accelerated healing technologies, providing rapid blood clotting and enhanced tissue repair.

ThingDef.label: animal dermal armor gland
ThingDef.description: An animal dermal armor gland implant. Releases chemical and nanomachines that transform the user's skin into a built-in suit of armor. The whole epidermis thickens and hardens to resist burns, while jointed exterior keratin plates form everywhere they can - including the head and face.

ThingDef.label: animal nuclear stomach
ThingDef.description: An animal nuclear stomach implant. A micro-nuclear reactor combined with complex chemical synthesis replaces the body's need for food energy. Food is required only to replace matter lost from the body, reducing the animal's intake needs significantly. However, there is little room to shield the reactor, so the radiation increases the risk of cancer.

ThingDef.label: animal unstable skip synapsis
ThingDef.description: An animal unstable skip synapsis implant that enables the animal to teleport short distances instantly. By creating controlled neural disruptions and linking them with micro-skipgates, it allows for rapid, unpredictable movement, enhancing the animal's ability to evade threats and reposition quickly in its environment.
